dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1978
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Admires the witness and energy of young Catholic Workers. Mentions visitors, books she is reading, renewed anti-Semitism, and her love of the Psalms.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 589 1978-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
